subject: GBDA
title: Capstone Course: Cross-Cultural Digital Business
description: In this capstone course students will research, design, and adapt digital products and services to suit specific cultures or communities. They will work with external stakeholders, such as global industry consultants, community clients, and mentors, in order to iteratively develop and create functional design solutions that are economically and socially feasible. [Note: Offered at Stratford campus.]
